### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(111.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler(position (111.5, -32.0)), offshore pump(position (106.5, -32.5)) and small electric pole(position (111.5, -30.5))

### Copper plate mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (41.0, -82.0)) and a furnace at position(41.0, -80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position (39.5, -79.5)) and a furnace at position(41.0, -80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position (41.5, -78.5)) and a furnace at position(41.0, -80.0)

### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory found

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using connect_entities function
-  Ensure that the positions passed to the connect_entities function are of type Position, not float.
-  Ensure that the entities being connected have a position attribute.

### Errors when using Position object
-  Ensure that the Position object has a position attribute before trying to access it.

### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure that the entity being placed is not being placed on top of another entity.

### NAMESPACE
-  No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
-  Important variables:
  - offshore_pump: OffshorePump object
  - boiler: Boiler object
  - steam_engine: SteamEngine object
  - burner_inserter: BurnerInserter object
  - burner_mining_drill: BurnerMiningDrill object
  - furnace: Furnace object
  - small_electric_pole: SmallElectricPole object
  - pipe: Pipe object
  - belt: Belt object
